subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: A Game 2 slide by the Dodgers’ Utley, an old Mets antagonist, injured shortstop Ruben Tejada, which has the Mets angry as the series careens back to New York.
snippet: A Game 2 slide by the Dodgers’ Utley, an old Mets antagonist, injured shortstop Ruben Tejada, which has the Mets angry as the series careens back to New York.
